title: Introduction to Management
description: Basic concepts and principles of management in organizations
learningObjectives: Understand the fundamental functions of management
Identify the key components of the planning process
Recognize the importance of decision-making in management
Apply basic management concepts to organizational scenarios

questions.text: Which of the following best describes the planning function of management?

options.text: Setting goals and deciding how to achieve them

questions.explanation: Planning is the primary management function that involves setting organizational goals and determining the best approach to achieve those goals. It provides direction and purpose to all other management activities.
